title: Self-Directed Learning Competency Development Program for Prospective Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical knowledge and general pedagogical concepts
context.additional_context: Requirement for a platform integrating formative assessment and AI tools in digital tool-enabled learning environments

learning_goals: Based on formative assessment feedback, learners can autonomously diagnose their learning process and develop improvement plans.
Learners can apply metacognitive strategies in mathematical problem-solving processes using AI-based tools.
Through peer and self-assessment, learners can quantitatively analyze learning outcomes and create reflective action plans.

resources: Digital checklist template for formative assessment

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
